channel.title: 2018 on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in 2018 on Barefoot Rob

item.title: last Akihabara lesson this year
item.description: 20:22 Thursday 20 December 2018 JST We had our last lesson of the year in Akihabara today. This is also Toshie’s last lesson so we had a party in her honor with all her favorite snack foods.

item.title: state of my life address
item.description: 22:12 Friday 07 December 2018 JST Marble Track 3 has its own domain, https://www.marbletrack3.com/ hosted as a static site on Netlify ConSwi is open source under GNU copyleft. Several outstanding issues, the biggest of which are #25 disallow dragged pieces to go through other pieces and #23 Make piece keep up with mouse when dragging I created a Patreon page for MT3 and have my first patron, Jimmy! I recently got the fans and battery replaced on my MacBook, but it still conks out when the battery is at 65%.

item.title: State of My Life Address
item.description: 00:13 Thursday 05 July 2018 JST Dreamhost has decided to stop supporting catch-all emails so I am looking for a new provider. The encrypted versions cannot search nor test for spam very well so I may not be happy with any of those I am too tired to write this right now so I should go to bed. For AB, I have started adding arc_cycles, which should save them a decent amount of time when creating historical reports.

item.title: State of My Life Address
item.description: 00:55 Saturday 02 June 2018 JST I just got home from Apocrypha #15 09:13 Saturday 02 June 2018 JST Was up too late last night and did not do much good for myself (porn), but I on the productive side I read some of MJG’s new book The Rot’s War Ignifer Cycle Book 2 co-gender circle seems to have come back to meeting after a significant dip in attendance over winter holidays men’s circle has had pretty solid attendance, often with 7 men.

item.title: It snowed today
item.description: 00:34 Thursday 22 March 2018 JST It snowed “today” and was 2 degrees C all day long. It’s apparently going up to 16 or 18 degrees C tomorrow. I chatted with Delayna who I’ve known since our mutual YRUU days back in late 1980s, culminating with ConCon 1988. Looking forward to seeing her herb business grow!

item.title: getting back to work in 2018
item.description: 08:44 Wednesday 10 January 2018 JST I worked yesterday for the first time in 2018. Monday was a holiday, and my 13:41 Wednesday 10 January 2018 JST I am on the train and the above is as far as I got before sidetracking myself with something before having a meeting with TY at 9am then lunch with Lin. Today: I got my AWS account switched to JPY instead of USD so I can pay more efficiently.

item.title: past week
item.description: 13:27 Monday 08 January 2018 JST Today is the last day of winter holiday for me. Lin and I have been back home for a week, during which I have mostly worked on Godot, read The Power of Now, watched movies with Lin, and worked a bit on MT3. This past Saturday, we went to see her family for Happy New Year, and I have been chatting with her niece in English on LINE since then.
